title: 015 - AQ Shipley Joins The Pod
description: On today's show, friend of the program, friend of the company , center for the Colts, Ravens, and Cardinals, AQ Shipley joins the boys live from his vehicle to shoot the breeze. AQ and the guys discuss the coronavirus and whether or not it has reached the desert yet, they talk about The Tiger King and try to decide whether Joe Exotic was framed (if you haven't watched the whole thing on Netflix, do so), chat about some of their other favorite documentaries, they also dive into aliens, bears, and give a little sneak peek of the Sweet 16 of the March Sadness Bracket. Stay safe out there, and enjoy.
